module.name: Time Conditions
module.description: Creates a condition where calls will go to one of two destinations (eg, an extension, IVR, ring group..) based on the time and/or date. This can be used for example to ring a receptionist during the day, or go directly to an IVR at night.
module.changelog: *13.0.33.2* FREEPBX-13609 Remove toggle all feature code as it was broken *13.0.33.1* FREEPBX-13802 Time conditions BLF: Timeconditions::checkTime() failure fix *13.0.33* FREEPBX-13614 Duplicate feature for time groups *13.0.32.4* FREEPBX-13802 Time conditions BLF: Timeconditions::checkTime() failure *13.0.32.3* FREEPBX-13416 Javascript collisions in timeconditions module *13.0.32.2* FREEPBX-13334 Wrong time in TimeConditions module *13.0.32.1* FREEPBX-13321 Validate the description in the front end and backend to prevent duplicates *13.0.32* Fix timeconditions_edit which broke backward compatibility *13.0.31* FREEPBX-12229 Fix toggle macro *13.0.30* FREEPBX-11911 dont reset permanent overrides *13.0.29* FREEPBX-12253 Remove all COS references *13.0.28* Fix job being run on secondary HA node *13.0.27.1* FREEPBX-12088 FREEPBX-12114 FREEPBX-12110 *13.0.26* FREEPBX-11830 Timeconditions for certain days are wrong *13.0.25* FREEPBX-11793 Fix timeconditions blf updater *13.0.24* FREEPBX-11784 Make sure bin dir is executable *13.0.23* Slowly remove tc-maint from cel over time *13.0.22* FREEPBX-11763 Feature code not working bug fix *13.0.21* FREEPBX-11758 Fix broken timeconditions *13.0.20* More cleanup *13.0.19* Fix broken callback links *13.0.18* Fix error in advanced settings add cron for scheduling tc-maint (if enabled) *13.0.17* Add new time groups from time conditions, new time conditions maint script that does not use dialplan! *13.0.16* FREEPBX-11605 figure out the highest number not the last number when adding an index *13.0.15* FREEPBX-11344 Fix delete url on timeconditions grid *13.0.14* Floating bootnav clock issues *13.0.13* Use moments to accurately display time *13.0.12* FREEPBX-10658 FREEPBX-10800 *13.0.11.1* Typo in url *13.0.11* Move grid to ajax, Add slideout menu *13.0.10* FREEPBX-10330 Fix adding group on update *13.0.9* FREEPBX-10163 FREEPBX-10184 fix javascript for form validation. *13.0.8* FREEPBX-10163 Time group with an apostrophe in its description does not get saved *13.0.7* Language prompt updates *13.0.6* FREEPBX-10089 fix javascript for timegroups *13.0.5* FREEPBX-9823 including comments, FREEPBX-9824, Fix time formatting in timegroups, small cleanup *13.0.4* FREEPBX-9702 Not possible configure days less than 10 *13.0.3* FREEPBX-9598 Set default timezone *13.0.2* FREEPBX-9039 Remove Departments from FreePBX, Fix popover resolves FREEPBX-8993 for timeconditions *13.0.1* FREEPBX-8689 *13.0.1alpha2* Fix toggle all feature code to set states properly. *13.0.1alpha1* Visual Changes
